## Setting up our project folder and opening it in VS Code {background-color="white"}

1. Create a folder on your computer - call it **LDSF_UK-PACT**
2. Go back to quarto and select _File/Open Folder..._"
3. Navigate to the folder you just created
4. Open this folder in VS Code
